Blog.post: lalala.....im watching golden girls...yay! i get to order my hair straightener soon. its a HAI convertable ceramic flat iron. i got into pegasus! yay for me. my dad's new thing is calling me 'gifted' and 'special'. i was mini golfing w/ my daddy, cousin, mom, and brother. my mom got the ball in the bullseye thing @ the last hole so we won a new game. i then preceeded to be like yay and jump up and down like a dork, and my dad was like yea every1 knos y we took so long we had special children w/ us. it took us a while @ each hole caz i sux so badd, i wud miss the hole when i was like 2 ft away. thats madd skill there. hehe....ali and i went to the mall today. it was fun...i bought perfume! yay for me. im playing summber bball. im on a team w/ lia..yay. i not on alyssa's team tho, its the 1st yr i havent been for summer league. eh....ill live im sure. im gunna do dance to yay. im also going to lake winnaposockie(major sp, pronounce phenaticly(sp on that to)) for 3 nights....yay. thats all for now..... --xoxo
me and ali @ her semi, its such an awesome pic. im on the right! urlLink

it took me 4eva to fall asleep last night. i didnt fall asleep till 3am. i hate tossing and turning. i woke ^ @ 8 this morning which was later than i had wanted to bcuz i wanted to call ali. however i didnt hear nathan arrive so there went that. @ 8am i went down stairs got advil and orange juice and then went back up to my room. i figured that ali wud be calling netime cuz i hadnt called her. so i laid down again and was 'resting my eyes'. i guess i fell back to sleep caz she called and i didnt hear the fone ring. had i, i wudve answered it. i feel bad. we were supposed to go to the mall. mayb we can go afta she gets the glass outa her foot. i feel like shit, im exhausted and my allergies are effectively preying on me. grrrrr... --xoxo

this is my new journal.......hmmm im not sure i like this font 2 much. i wish i was better w/ html...well i hope this works out ok..lol there was another blog site that i found buh i think that i liek this 1 betta. i ali is talking to this girl erica right now. well there was this hole big thing, u c 1/2 way thro this year ali left prout and transfered to coventry. me nd ali r best friends. erica was a friend of ours 2. well erica stayed @ prout. and supposedly she spread all this shit around about ali that was so totally untrue. it was ridiculous stuff like how ali was so mean to her. she sooo wasnt. and i checked the story thro a cpl diff ppl and as far as ali and i cud tell it was true. well now afta all this ali is talking to her again. we find out that erica is transfering to west warwick high. now shes gunna havta go and make all new friends and the whole nine yards. she may not even have had ne real friends at prout. i just hope that erica isnnt doing this bcuz now she has no otha friends. ill kill her......i mean hasnt she tortured ali enough?....i dont get it. y now? she knew ali found out all them things and if she didnt say those things, which im pretty sure she did, y did she wait for ali 2 im her? i mean wudnt she want to clear things up if her and ali were such 'good' friends and she cared that much....idk sounds a little bit like 2 much of a cowinky dink 2 me hmm....
